summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Lane Street from 22nd Avenue South to 24th Avenue South and Weller Street from 24th Avenue South to 30th Avenue South in the City of Seattle, by constructing, concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 10076, creating Local Improvement District No. 855 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
